data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Resen to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Resen, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Resen, North Macedonia by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 586 lost neighbors

data.prayer: the state of Resen has (about) 15 people who know Jesus, 5,439 people who know about him culturally, and 3,346 people who are far from Jesus.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Resen, North Macedonia.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Albanian, Macedonian people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Albanian, Macedonian people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Albanian, Macedonian people is yours.
Jesus, 8,800 people live in the state of Resen. Please, give them 1 new simple churches this year.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Resen, North Macedonia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Resen.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
